casebody.data:
MIDLAND LINSEED PRODUCTS COMPANY, Libelant-Appellee, v. IMPORTERS’ & EXPORTERS’ INSURANCE COMPANY OF NEW YORK, Respondent-Appellant; Lighter Melbourne; Atlantic Lighterage Corporation, Impleaded, Claimant-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 19, 1927. No. 88. Duncan & Mount, of New York City (Joseph K. Inness, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Everett, Clarke & Benedict, of New York City (Herman S. Hertwig and John P. Allee, both of New York City, of counsel), for libel-ant-appellee. Maeklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Pierre- M. Brown, of New York City, of counsel), for claimant-appellee!

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
